description:
Classic denim looks with extra mobility and an interior lining for extra warmth. Sounds too good to be true, but give the men's Hillgard Lined Jean a tug and you'll instantly feel that superb stretch.

Part of the performance stretch denim collection, this style has the features you want in an active jean. Like a gusseted inseam and a classic standard fit.

Best of all, this organic-cotton jean is made using a waterless wash, giving you that same denim look without using excessive natural resources.
name: Prana Hillgard Lined Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens
